metadata.title: CVE-2020-7045 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
In Wireshark 3.0.x before 3.0.8, the BT ATT dissector could crash. This wasaddressed in epan/dissectors/packet-btatt.c by validating opcodes.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-7045` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 3.4.4-1ubuntu1
libwireshark14 - 3.4.4-1ubuntu1
libwiretap11 - 3.4.4-1ubuntu1
libwsutil12 - 3.4.4-1ubuntu1
tshark - 3.4.4-1ubuntu1
wireshark - 3.4.4-1ubuntu1
wireshark-common - 3.4.4-1ubuntu1
wireshark-gtk - 3.4.4-1ubuntu1
wireshark-qt - 3.4.4-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.4-1ubuntu1').
